text.jpText:
――本はいいぞ。
アンタも読むか？
text.enText:
――Books are good. 
You wanna read them?

text.jpText:
物語でも学術書でも――辞典でもいい、
知とは糧、いずれ魂の血肉となるだろう。
text.enText:
Doesn't matter if it's fiction or non-fiction――Even a lexicon will do. 
Knowledge is nourishment, and will eventuallybe your phronesis.

text.jpText:
知慮なき者が美辞麗句を纏うのは
『骸骨を着飾るが如し』――
text.enText:
Those with no wisdom using flowery words as 
imitation is like dressing up a skeleton with 
beautiful clothes ―― "vanitas vanitatum"

text.jpText:
『本物』を飾るのに相応しきは
『本物』の言葉だけだ……！
text.enText:
The only thing that's worthy of adorning the 
wise is knowledge……！
